thread.title: Candy Spelling Throws Extravagant Bel-Air Baby Shower for Daughter Tori Following Past Estrangement
thread.title_full: Candy Spelling Throws Extravagant Bel-Air Baby Shower for Daughter Tori Following Past Estrangement

author: Leena Tailor
title: Candy Spelling Throws Extravagant Bel-Air Baby Shower for Daughter Tori Following Past Estrangement
text: Candy Spelling Throws Extravagant Bel-Air Baby Shower for Daughter Tori Following Past Estrangement by Leena Tailor 2:08 PM PST, February 14, 2017 Playing Candy Spelling Throws Extravagant Bel-Air Baby Shower for Daughter Tori Following Past Estrangement Tori Spelling’s baby shower was nothing short of amazing! On Sunday, the actress enjoyed a lavish celebration ahead of welcoming her fifth child with husband Dean McDermott . And, despite their often-strained relationship, the star’s mom, Candy Spelling, threw the beautiful bash at the Hotel Bel-Air in Los Angeles, California. WATCH: Tori Spelling Looks Very Pregnant in New Selfie “Such an honor to host @torispelling baby shower,” Candy captioned a snap of the gorgeous table settings on Instagram. “Tori’s fifth! #babyshowers #candygram #torispelling#family #grandkids” The decadent party was helmed by celebrity party planner Mindy Weiss who managed to fulfill one of her décor dreams. “Loving our baby shower today! My dream to have a moving train go around the table!” Weiss wrote alongside a video of the impressive prop on Instagram. A post shared by Mindy Weiss (@mindyweiss) on Feb 11, 2017 at 4:51pm PST In addition to trains, the table also featured miniature first-aid kits, baby blue velvet napkins, enough flowers to open a floral shop and coffee cups, “cause there’ll be no sleeping in that home!” A post shared by Mindy Weiss (@mindyweiss) on Feb 11, 2017 at 4:56pm PST A post shared by Candy Spelling (@candyspelling) on Feb 12, 2017 at 12:13am PST A post shared by Candy Spelling (@candyspelling) on Feb 11, 2017 at 5:17pm PST Earlier in the weekend, Tori was in countdown mode, sharing a photo showing her getting some R&R in before her baby boy arrives. “Officially in nesting mode with only 3 weeks till Baby #5 arrives!” the Beverly Hills, 90210 alum wrote. “While getting in some rest I have been reading @bkobliner 's new book, Make Your Kid a Money Genius (Even If You're Not) . If you haven't yet got your copy of Beth Kobliner's new book, head to the link in my bio! This book is so great and informative with tips on how to navigate your little ones with fun learning activities thru their formative years in respect to money. #moneygenius @hashtagpaid” A post shared by Tori Spelling (@torispelling) on Feb 10, 2017 at 8:07pm PST WATCH: Tori Spelling Shows Off Baby Bump While Attending ‘Moana’ Premiere Baby number five isn’t the only new addition to the family. Tori recently took to social media to share a portrait with newcomer Nutmeg -- a pet pig! The actress had been on the waitlist with Oink Oink Mini Pigs and was overjoyed when she received notification that Nutmeg had entered the world in October and would soon join her family. “I literally squealed with excitement,” she shared on her blog . “Maybe not the ideal timing with my baby due so soon, but all babies are blessings whenever they come into your life! Nutmeg is so sweet and such a great addition to our family! My babies absolutely love her! Welcome to the family Nutmeg!” A post shared by Tori Spelling (@torispelling) on Feb 3, 2017 at 1:04pm PST See more on Tori’s pregnancy in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
